name: css-manager
description: A manager to edit the ui_chara_db, ui_layout_db, and msbt data with a Web Interface.

scripts.make: electron-forge make && xcopy /v /y run_with_console.bat out\css-manager-win32-x64\ && xcopy /v /y test_programs.bat out\css-manager-win32-x64\ && del /S /Q .\out\css-manager-win32-x64\resources\files\*.prc && del /S /Q .\out\css-manager-win32-x64\resources\files\*.msbt && del /S /Q .\out\css-manager-win32-x64\resources\tools\prc2json\ParamLabels.csv

author: Ali Hussain (Coolsonickirby/Random)
